debug.send: Successfully sent the data to Princess Luna.
debug.senderrA: Error while sending data to Princess Luna: Other error.
debug.senderrB: Error while sending data to Princess Luna: Timed out.

waifu.request:
Waifu request received with following parameters:
  Method=%s, Noise=%s, Scale=%s
waifu.finish: Waifu processing finished, time taken: %s sec. Sending back the new file.
waifu.finisherr: Waifu processing finished with an error.
waifu.errorA: Invalid waifu request received: Insufficient parameters.
waifu.errorB: Invalid waifu request received: Invalid noise level parameter.
waifu.errorC: Invalid waifu request received: Invalid scale parameter.
waifu.errorD: Invalid waifu request received: Non-existant method derived.
